Key Match Events: Jhon Cordoba knocked in a header for the first goal of the match
James Rodriguez hammered home a penalty kick for the second goal
Richard Rios delivered a roaring goal into the left side of the net for Colombia's fourth goal
Luis Diaz lifted a kick over the goalkeeper and in for Colombia's third goal of the first half
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at State Farm Stadium in Glendale, Arizona
